definition: Yi county in Baoding 保定[Bao3 ding4], Hebei
easy/amiable/to change/to exchange/prefix corresponding to the English adjective suffix "-able" or "-ible"
surname Yi/abbr. for 易經|易经[Yi4 jing1], the Book of Changes
Miyi county in Panzhihua 攀枝花[Pan1 zhi1 hua1], south Sichuan

sentences.english: Xiling sits about 100 kilometres to the west of Beijing in Yixian.
sentences.chinese: 西陵位於北京市以西100公里處的河北省易縣。

sentences.english: Meanwhile, we gave some ideas about how to promote the tour industry of Yixia…
sentences.chinese: 並對易縣旅遊業的進一步發展提出了設想。

sentences.english: Meanwhile, we gave some ideas about how to promote the tour industry of Yixian county.
sentences.chinese: 並對易縣旅遊業的進一步發展提出了設想。
